divs: sighting detailsi was traveling east on western row road approaching the intersection of western row road and snider road. my wife and i both seen the objects ahead of us in the sky. i guessed the objects were no farther away than a mile and no higher up than maybe 700 to 800 feet. we were able to guess the height by using the wlw radio tower across town as a reference. the objects appeared to be 3 dark objects roughly round in shape with a pulsing flickering orange\amber light at the top. the objects were moving in a triangular formation in a northerly direction with 2 objects in the lead and one trailing. the 2 lead objects were moving erratically forward and back in a horizontal manner while still maintaining a northward direction. at first we thought the objects were helicopters but realized they didn't have the telltale shape of an aircraft. i turned left\north onto snider road to try to keep the objects in sight but they gained elevation and were obscured by the clouds before they reached the wlw radio tower.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Mason
There were no other sightings in Mason on or around December 31st 2010
